catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Weekender Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Jeans for ultimate comfort and durability
catentdesc.longdescription: These relaxed fit jeans are perfect for weekend wear, whether you are cottaging, renovating, or just relaxing on the couch. Relaxed through the thigh with a straight leg. Zip fly, with a button enclosure.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Outsiders Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Casual jeans with a vintage wash
catentdesc.longdescription: Comfort is key in these vintage-look loose fit jeans. Turn up the cuff for an extra-casual look. Five-pocket styling.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Indigo Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Timeless faded jeans in a relaxed fit
catentdesc.longdescription: You willl think you have found your long-lost favorite pair of jeans the first time you wear these. These Gusso jeans feature natural-looking fading on the thighs, a button closure, and a zip fly.

catentdesc.name: Albini Marcos Pants
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dress pants with a comfortable stretch
catentdesc.longdescription: Business casual at its best. These pants sit at the waist and have a straight leg for a slimming effect. 5% spandex gives you room to move.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Straight Fit Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic jeans for home or office
catentdesc.longdescription: Feel comfortable, look smart! These jeans have a darker wash for a more formal look. They sit at the waist, with a straight leg, button closure, and zip fly.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Loose Fit Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These jeans are best-sellers because they are incredibly comfortable and they fit almost everyone. Cut straight down from the waist with extra room in the thigh and calf. Button-up fly.

catentdesc.name: Albini Relaxed Fit Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: With extra room in the thigh, these Albini jeans have a casual look that is perfect for fun and relaxation. They feature oversized stitching on pockets and seams, for a western flair. Zip fly, with a button enclosure.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Gris Trousers
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dress for success in these slim fitting dress pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These 100% wool trousers are ideal for the office, paired with a shirt and tie, or sport coat. These slim-fitting Luigi Valenti trousers have two front pockets and back welt pockets.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Tapered Suit Pants
catentdesc.shortdescription: Tailored and slim fitting suit pants
catentdesc.longdescription: The slightly tapered leg gives these suit pants a more informal look without being baggy or messy. With two off-seam pockets and two back welt pockets. Made of polyester, these pants are machine washable.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Navy Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Straight cut jeans with spandex for comfort
catentdesc.longdescription: Show off your signature style in these flattering straight-leg jeans from Versatil. They feature a button-and-zip fly and distressed pockets. Made of denim with a hint of spandex for that extra bit of stretch.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Regular Fit Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Smart and casual jeans for all occasions
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic, youthful jeans for everyday wear. Relaxed through the thigh with a straight leg. Comfort and style!

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Suit Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: Roomy and comfortable, these suit pants have a single-pleated front and button-down back pockets. Dry clean only.

catentdesc.name: Albini Classic Fit Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: The all-American jean for understated cool
catentdesc.longdescription: These jeans look like the ones movie stars wear when they get caught on camera by paparazzi. With straight legs and just the right amount of distressing on the thighs. Buttoned fly.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Montage Jeans
catentdesc.shortdescription: Rugged and casual low rise jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Boot-cut, Western-style jeans with subtle whiskering for a unique look The pockets feature leather detail with brass embellishments. Low-rise.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Straight Leg Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These Hermitage Collection jeans go with everything and feel ultra-comfortable. Featuring traditional five-pocket styling and plain back pockets. Jeans you 'll want to wear every day.
